achievements: Development of complex, optimized code solutions (Python, JavaScript, AWS) without AI assistance, establishing the Gold Standard for model training.
Analysis, debugging, and evaluation of AI-generated code, identifying hallucinations, logical inefficiencies, and security vulnerabilities.
Decomposition of complex engineering problems to audit the model's Chain of Thought, ensuring the AI follows engineering best practices.
Design and refinement of technical test scenarios to challenge model capabilities in cloud (AWS) and backend development environments.
Direct contribution to increasing AI agent precision on complex coding tasks through detailed technical feedback and logic correction.
Creation of a manually-verified software engineering problems and solutions bank used to calibrate model performance against senior engineers.
Detection and reporting of recurring error patterns in model code generation, enabling targeted adjustments in inference engine training.
Development and maintenance of backend endpoints using Django and Python
Improvement and optimization of the frontend implemented in Vue.js
Optimization of the Azure cloud server, achieving a 75% reduction in response times
Implementation of internationalization for Spanish and Portuguese in the frontend
Development and maintenance of technical documentation for the project
Integration of Large Language Models (LLM) to improve user experience
Successful styling and animation of landing pages
Establishment of code standards and best practices in the frontend team
Implementation of new features in React.js, improving user experience
Application performance optimization, reducing loading times by 40%

work.company: GIOSA, Gestión Integral y Soluciones en Salud
achievements: Participated in designing and developing scalable RESTful APIs for interoperability between health systems, ensuring integrity of critical data.
Implemented business logic required for compliance with RIPS regulations and DIAN requirements.
Orchestrated environment migration and configuration using Docker and Kubernetes, establishing CI/CD pipelines to automate deployments.
Executed refactoring of legacy modules to improve maintainability and designed testing strategies (unit and E2E) to ensure system stability.
40% reduction in testing deployment times through the implementation of automated CI/CD pipelines.
30% increase in critical API response speed after codebase refactoring and database query optimization.
Significant reduction in testing bugs through implementation of an automated test suite and code quality standards.
